text: - There are different types of treatment for patients with lip and oral cavity cancer.     - Patients with lip and oral cavity cancer should have their treatment planned by a team of doctors who are expert in treating head and neck cancer.    - Two types of standard treatment are used:         - Surgery      - Radiation therapy         - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.          - Chemotherapy      - Hyperfractionated radiation therapy     - Hyperthermia therapy
